divs: sighting detailsi was hoping to catch the beginning of the meteor shower over the uk when i spotted a bright star moving north, very high above the eastern coastline here in northern ireland. it changed directions twice and picked up speed. as my eyes focused more on it, i realized it was triangle in shape. after it finished moving in an 's' pattern it simply vanished. the whole thing took less than 20 seconds. it was a heart jumping experience. *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms). county down
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Belfast
There were no other sightings in Belfast on or around August 11th 2010
Summary: UFO - (Triangle in shape) sighted above the coast in Northern Ireland.
